text: The Mill of Good Luck () is a 1955 Romanian drama movie directed by Victor Iliu and was based on the short story of the same name. It stars Constantin Codrescu, Ioana Bulcă, Colea Răutu, Valeria Gagialov and was remade as Orizont in 2015. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Victor Iliu
title: The Mill of Good Luck
